title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 

(No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 3A - 

in paragraph (a), by the substitution of “date, or during the 
period,” for “date”, and 

in paragraph (c), by the substitution of “number of persons 
(which, in the case of an event taking place over a period of 
more than one day, may include a number of persons per 
day)” for “number of persons”, 

(i) 

(ii) 

and 

(b) by the substitution of the Schedule to these Regulations for 

Schedule 3 to those Regulations. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [304] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 217 of 2021) to 
make amendments to the list of “Scheduled Events”.
